QuestData.Title: Beating the Odds
QuestData.Description: At first, the Slitherscale were too frightened to approach the wild serpents.$B$BThen, I caught them snatching the eggs under the cover of night.$B$BNow, they are slaughtering adults and hatchlings alike!$B$BIf we do not do something, these gentle creatures will be completely wiped out. Then there won't even be an Order of the Cloud Serpent to join!$B$BGo and slay these vile Slitherscales, and then we will talk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Slitherscale Rippers or Slitherscale Eggdrinkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Order rarely meddles with the natural balance on this island, but it is too important to save the serpents.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r.$B$BI tried to stop the Slitherscale where I could, but I was no match for their numbers.$B$BYour work today will help preserve an entire generation of cloud serpents.
